comments.body: thanks @feynmanliang . I have put the changes as per comments

Please fix indentation: [https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/SPARK/Spark+Code+Style+Guide]

Actually, I don't think we need to test correctness here since it's tested in the Java unit test

thanks @jkbradley. I think you meant scala unit test. Please note that the org test was testing for the topicDist vs corpus count. also we test other things like log likelyhood etc in both scala and java unittest.
You're right; I meant scala!  Leaving it sounds fine.
